title: Is Bitcoin what we will work for in the near future? - Quora

response.answer_text: Bitcoin is what you should be working for now as much as you can you should be dollar cost averaging even if you're just buying $10 worth of bitcoin at a time over time you will be in a good position down the road.
No bitcoin maximum can be just 21 million , everyone on this planet cant have it. fiat and coins will exist and banking system too. hence you will work as usual for your national currency.
